spriteManager::bgSprite

spriteManager::bgSprite Struct Reference

A set of raw data that tiled image backgrounds may use to be more easily loaded. More...

#include <spriteManager.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

const unsigned short * bg_Pal
const unsigned char * bg_Map
const unsigned char * bg_Tiles

Detailed Description

A set of raw data that tiled image backgrounds may use to be more easily loaded.

Contains pallete data, tile data and the tile mapping.

See also:
spriteManager::spriteSet
